Class RtfElementFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.blog.export.impl.RtfElementFactory

  • public class RtfElementFactory
extends Object
    This factory is used to create necessary elements for the RtfNoteWriter.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

                                                   float width,

                                            throws com.lowagie.text.BadElementException,

        Returns:
